benchmark-title: CIS Microsoft Intune for Windows 11 Benchmark

rules.rule-title: (L1) Ensure 'Allow Cortana Above Lock' is set to 'Block'
(L1) Ensure 'Prevent enabling lock screen camera' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Prevent enabling lock screen slide show' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Apply UAC restrictions to local accounts on network logons' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Configure SMB v1 client driver' is set to 'Enabled: Disable driver (recommended)'
(L1) Ensure 'Configure SMB v1 server' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable Structured Exception Handling Overwrite Protection (SEHOP)' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'WDigest Authentication' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'MSS: (AutoAdminLogon) Enable Automatic Logon (not recommended)' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'MSS: (DisableIPSourceRouting IPv6) IP source routing protection level (protects against packet spoofing)' is set to 'Enabled: Highest protection, source routing is completely disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'MSS: (DisableIPSourceRouting) IP source routing protection level (protects against packet spoofing)' is set to 'Enabled: Highest protection, source routing is completely disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'MSS: (EnableICMPRedirect) Allow ICMP redirects to override OSPF generated routes' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'MSS: (NoNameReleaseOnDemand) Allow the computer to ignore NetBIOS name release requests except from WINS servers' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'MSS: (SafeDllSearchMode) Enable Safe DLL search mode (recommended)' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'MSS: (ScreenSaverGracePeriod) The time in seconds before the screen saver grace period expires (0 recommended)' is set to 'Enabled: 5 or fewer seconds'
(L1) Ensure 'MSS: (WarningLevel) Percentage threshold for the security event log at which the system will generate a warning' is set to 'Enabled: 90% or less'
(L1) Ensure 'Turn off multicast name resolution' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Prohibit installation and configuration of Network Bridge on your DNS domain network' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Prohibit use of Internet Connection Sharing on your DNS domain network' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Require domain users to elevate when setting a network's location' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Hardened UNC Paths' is set to 'Enabled, with "Require Mutual Authentication", "Require Integrity", and “Require Privacy” set for all NETLOGON and SYSVOL shares'
(L1) Ensure 'Minimize the number of simultaneous connections to the Internet or a Windows Domain' is set to 'Enabled: 3 = Prevent Wi-Fi when on Ethernet'
(L1) Ensure 'Prohibit connection to non-domain networks when connected to domain authenticated network' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Allow Print Spooler to accept client connections' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Configure Redirection Guard: Redirection Guard Options' is set to 'Enabled: Redirection Guard Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Configure RPC connection settings: Protocol to use for outgoing RPC connections' is set to 'Enabled: RPC over TCP'
(L1) Ensure 'Configure RPC connection settings: Use authentication for outgoing RPC connections' is set to 'Enabled: Default'
(L1) Ensure 'Configure RPC listener settings: Authentication protocol to use for incoming RPC connections:' is set to 'Enabled: Negotiate' or higher
(L1) Ensure 'Configure RPC listener settings: Protocols to allow for incoming RPC connections' is set to 'Enabled: RPC over TCP'
(L1) Ensure 'Configure RPC over TCP port: RPC over TCP port:' is set to 'Enabled: 0'
(L1) Ensure 'Limits print driver installation to Administrators' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Manage processing of Queue-specific files: Manage processing of Queue-Specific files' is set to 'Enabled: Limit Queue-specific files to Color profiles'
(L1) Ensure 'Point and Print Restrictions: When installing drivers for a new connection' is set to 'Enabled: Show warning and elevation prompt'
(L1) Ensure 'Point and Print Restrictions: When updating drivers for an existing connection' is set to 'Enabled: Show warning and elevation prompt'
(L1) Ensure 'Turn off toast notifications on the lock screen (User)' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Include command line in process creation events' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Encryption Oracle Remediation' is set to 'Enabled: Force Updated Clients'
(L1) Ensure 'Remote host allows delegation of non-exportable credentials' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Prevent device metadata retrieval from the Internet' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Boot-Start Driver Initialization Policy' is set to 'Enabled: Good, unknown and bad but critical'
(L1) Ensure 'Continue experiences on this device' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Turn off downloading of print drivers over HTTP' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Turn off Internet download for Web publishing and online ordering wizards' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Block user from showing account details on sign-in' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Do not display network selection UI' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Do not enumerate connected users on domain-joined computers' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Enumerate local users on domain-joined computers' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Turn off app notifications on the lock screen' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Turn off picture password sign-in' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Turn on convenience PIN sign-in' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Require a password when a computer wakes (on battery)' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Require a password when a computer wakes (plugged in)' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Configure Offer Remote Assistance' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Configure Solicited Remote Assistance' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable RPC Endpoint Mapper Client Authentication' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Restrict Unauthenticated RPC clients' is set to 'Enabled: Authenticated'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable Windows NTP Client' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable Windows NTP Server' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Allow Microsoft accounts to be optional' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Do not preserve zone information in file attachments (User)' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Notify antivirus programs when opening attachments (User)' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Disallow Autoplay for non-volume devices' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Set the default behavior for AutoRun' is set to 'Enabled: Do not execute any autorun commands'
(L1) Ensure 'Turn off Autoplay' is set to 'Enabled: All drives'
(L1) Ensure 'Do not display the password reveal button' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Enumerate administrator accounts on elevation' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Prevent the use of security questions for local accounts' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable App Installer Experimental Features' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable App Installer Hash Override' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable App Installer ms-appinstaller protocol' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Control Event Log behavior when the log file reaches its maximum size' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Specify the maximum log file size (KB)' is set to 'Enabled: 32,768 or greater'
(L1) Ensure 'Control Event Log behavior when the log file reaches its maximum size' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Specify the maximum log file size (KB)' is set to 'Enabled: 196,608 or greater'
(L1) Ensure 'Control Event Log behavior when the log file reaches its maximum size' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Specify the maximum log file size (KB)' is set to 'Enabled: 32,768 or greater'
(L1) Ensure 'Control Event Log behavior when the log file reaches its maximum size' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Specify the maximum log file size (KB)' is set to 'Enabled: 32,768 or greater'
(L1) Ensure 'Configure Windows Defender SmartScreen' is set to 'Enabled: Warn and prevent bypass'
(L1) Ensure 'Turn off Data Execution Prevention for Explorer' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Turn off heap termination on corruption' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Turn off shell protocol protected mode' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Block all consumer Microsoft account user authentication' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Configure local setting override for reporting to Microsoft MAPS' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Prevent users from sharing files within their profile. (User)' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Do not allow passwords to be saved' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Do not allow drive redirection' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Always prompt for password upon connection' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Require secure RPC communication' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Require use of specific security layer for remote (RDP) connections' is set to 'Enabled: SSL'
(L1) Ensure 'Require user authentication for remote connections by using Network Level Authentication' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Set client connection encryption level' is set to 'Enabled: High Level'
(L1) Ensure 'Do not delete temp folders upon exit' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Prevent downloading of enclosures' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Turn off the offer to update to the latest version of Windows' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable MPR notifications for the system' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Sign-in and lock last interactive user automatically after a restart' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Allow Basic authentication' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Allow unencrypted traffic' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Disallow Digest authentication' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Allow Basic authentication' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Allow unencrypted traffic' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Disallow WinRM from storing RunAs credentials' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Account Logon Audit Credential Validation' is set to 'Success and Failure'
(L1) Ensure 'Account Logon Logoff Audit Account Lockout' is set to include 'Failure'
(L1) Ensure 'Account Logon Logoff Audit Group Membership' is set to include 'Success'
(L1) Ensure 'Account Management Audit Application Group Management' is set to 'Success and Failure'
(L1) Ensure 'Audit Authorization Policy Change' is set to include 'Success'
(L1) Ensure 'Audit File Share Access' is set to 'Success and Failure'
(L1) Ensure 'Audit Other Logon Logoff Events' is set to 'Success and Failure'
(L1) Ensure 'Audit Security System Extension' is set to include 'Success'
(L1) Ensure 'Audit User Account Management' is set to 'Success and Failure'
(L1) Ensure 'Detailed Tracking Audit PNP Activity' is set to include 'Success'
(L1) Ensure 'Detailed Tracking Audit Process Creation' is set to include 'Success'
(L1) Ensure 'Object Access Audit Detailed File Share' is set to include 'Failure'
(L1) Ensure 'Object Access Audit Other Object Access Events' is set to 'Success and Failure'
(L1) Ensure 'Object Access Audit Removable Storage' is set to 'Success and Failure'
(L1) Ensure 'Policy Change Audit MPSSVC Rule Level Policy Change' is set to 'Success and Failure'
(L1) Ensure 'Policy Change Audit Other Policy Change Events' is set to include 'Failure'
(L1) Ensure 'Privilege Use Audit Sensitive Privilege Use' is set to 'Success and Failure'
(L1) Ensure 'System Audit I Psec Driver' is set to 'Success and Failure'
(L1) Ensure 'Config refresh' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Refresh cadence' is set to '90' (or less)
(L1) Ensure 'Allow Behavior Monitoring' is set to 'Allowed'
(L1) Ensure 'Allow Email Scanning' is set to 'Allowed'
(L1) Ensure 'Allow Full Scan Removable Drive Scanning' is set to 'Allowed'
(L1) Ensure 'Allow Realtime Monitoring' is set to 'Allowed'
(L1) Ensure 'Allow scanning of all downloaded files and attachments' is set to 'Allowed'
(L1) Ensure 'Allow Script Scanning' is set to 'Allowed'
(L1) Ensure 'ASR: Block abuse of exploited vulnerable signed drivers' is set to 'Block'
(L1) Ensure 'ASR: Block Adobe Reader from creating child processes' is set to 'Block'
(L1) Ensure 'ASR: Block all Office applications from creating child processes' is set to 'Audit' or higher
(L1) Ensure 'ASR: Block credential stealing from the Windows local security authority subsystem' is set to 'Block'
(L1) Ensure 'ASR: Block executable content from email client and webmail' is set to 'Block'
(L1) Ensure 'ASR: Block executable files from running unless they meet a prevalence, age, or trusted list criterion' is set to 'Audit' or higher
(L1) Ensure 'ASR: Block execution of potentially obfuscated scripts' is set to 'Audit' or higher
(L1) Ensure 'ASR: Block JavaScript or VBScript from launching downloaded executable content' is set to 'Block'
(L1) Ensure 'ASR: Block Office applications from creating executable content' is set to 'Block'
(L1) Ensure 'ASR: Block Office applications from injecting code into other processes' is set to 'Block'
(L1) Ensure 'ASR: Block Office communication application from creating child processes' is set to 'Audit' or higher
(L1) Ensure 'ASR: Block persistence through WMI event subscription' is set to 'Block'
(L1) Ensure 'ASR: Block process creations originating from PSExec and WMI commands' is set to 'Audit' or higher
(L1) Ensure 'ASR: Block untrusted and unsigned processes that run from USB' is set to 'Block'
(L1) Ensure 'ASR: Block Win32 API calls from Office macros' is set to 'Block'
(L1) Ensure 'ASR: Use advanced protection against ransomware' is set to 'Audit' or higher
(L1) Ensure 'Days Until Aggressive Catchup Quick Scan' is set to '7 days' or fewer
(L1) Ensure 'Enable Network Protection' is set to 'Enabled (block mode)'
(L1) Ensure 'Hide Exclusions From Local Users' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Oobe Enable Rtp And Sig Update' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'PUA Protection' is set to 'PUA Protection on'
(L1) Ensure 'Quick Scan Include Exclusions' is set to '1'
(L1) Ensure 'Remote Encryption Protection Configured State' is set to 'Audit: Generate EDR detections without blocking' or higher
(L1) Ensure 'DO Download Mode' is NOT set to 'HTTP blended with Internet Peering'
(L1) Ensure 'Configure System Guard Launch' is set to 'Unmanaged Enables Secure Launch if supported by hardware'
(L1) Ensure 'Credential Guard' is set to 'Enabled with UEFI lock'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable Virtualization Based Security' is set to 'Enable virtualization based security'
(L1) Ensure 'Require Platform Security Features' is set to 'Turns on VBS with Secure Boot' or higher
(L1) Ensure 'Device Password Enabled' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Device Password Enabled: Alphanumeric Device Password Required' is set to 'Password or Alphanumeric PIN required'
(L1) Ensure 'Device Password Enabled: Min Device Password Complex Characters' is set to 'Digits and lowercase letters are required'
(L1) Ensure 'Device Password Enabled: Device Password Expiration' is set to '365 or fewer days, but not 0'
(L1) Ensure 'Device Password Enabled: Device Password History' is set to '24 or more password(s)'
(L1) Ensure 'Device Password Enabled: Max Device Password Failed Attempts' is set to '5 or fewer failed attempt(s), but not 0'
(L1) Ensure 'Device Password Enabled: Max Inactivity Time Device Lock' is set to '15 or fewer minutes, but not 0'
(L1) Ensure 'Device Password Enabled: Min Device Password Length' is set to '14 or more character(s)'
(L1) Ensure 'Minimum Password Age' is set to '1 or more day(s)'
(L1) Ensure 'Allow Cortana' is set to 'Block'
(L1) Ensure 'Allow Spotlight Collection (User)' is set to '0'
(L1) Ensure 'Do not show feedback notifications' is set to 'Feedback notifications are disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable Domain Network Firewall' is set to 'True'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable Domain Network Firewall: Default Inbound Action for Domain Profile' is set to 'Block'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable Domain Network Firewall: Disable Inbound Notifications' is set to 'True'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable Domain Network Firewall: Enable Log Dropped Packets' is set to 'Yes: Enable Logging Of Dropped Packets'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable Domain Network Firewall: Enable Log Success Connections' is set to 'Enable Logging Of Successful Connections'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable Domain Network Firewall: Log File Path' is set to '%SystemRoot%\System32\logfiles\firewall\domainfw.log'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable Domain Network Firewall: Log Max File Size' is set to '16,384 KB or greater'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable Private Network Firewall' is set to 'True'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable Private Network Firewall: Default Inbound Action for Private Profile' is set to 'Block'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable Private Network Firewall: Disable Inbound Notifications' is set to 'True'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable Private Network Firewall: Enable Log Success Connections' is set to 'Enable Logging Of Successful Connections'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable Private Network Firewall: Enable Log Dropped Packets' is set to 'Yes: Enable Logging Of Dropped Packets'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable Private Network Firewall: Log File Path' is set to '%SystemRoot%\System32\logfiles\firewall\privatefw.log'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable Private Network Firewall: Log Max File Size' is set to '16,384 KB or greater'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable Public Network Firewall' is set to 'True'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable Public Network Firewall: Allow Local Ipsec Policy Merge' is set to 'False'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable Public Network Firewall: Allow Local Policy Merge' is set to 'False'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable Public Network Firewall: Default Inbound Action for Public Profile' is set to 'Block'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable Public Network Firewall: Disable Inbound Notifications' is set to 'True'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable Public Network Firewall: Enable Log Dropped Packets' is set to 'Yes: Enable Logging Of Dropped Packets'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable Public Network Firewall: Enable Log Success Connections' is set to 'Enable Logging Of Successful Connections'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable Public Network Firewall: Log File Path' is set to '%SystemRoot%\System32\logfiles\firewall\publicfw.log'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable Public Network Firewall: Log Max File Size' is set to '16,384 KB or greater'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable insecure guest logons' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Configure 'Accounts: Rename administrator account'
(L1) Configure 'Accounts: Rename guest account'
(L1) Ensure 'Network access: Restrict clients allowed to make remote calls to SAM' is set to 'Administrators: Remote Access: Allow'
(L1) Ensure 'User Account Control: Behavior of the elevation prompt for standard users' is set to 'Automatically deny elevation requests'
(L1) Ensure 'Configure Lsa Protected Process is set to 'Enabled with UEFI Lock...'
(L1) Ensure 'Allow apps from the Microsoft app store to auto update' is set to 'Allowed'
(L1) Ensure 'Allow Game DVR' is set to 'Block'
(L1) Ensure 'Block Non Admin User Install' is set to 'Allow'
(L1) Ensure 'MSI Allow user control over installs' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'MSI Always install with elevated privileges' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'MSI Always install with elevated privileges (User)' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Allow Input Personalization' is set to 'Block'
(L1) Ensure 'Let Apps Activate With Voice Above Lock' is set to 'Enabled: Force Deny'
(L1) Ensure 'Allow Indexing Encrypted Stores Or Items' is set to 'Block'
(L1) Ensure 'Allow Search To Use Location' is set to 'Block'
(L1) Ensure 'Notify Malicious' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Notify Password Reuse' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Notify Unsafe App' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Service Enabled' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable Sudo' is set to 'Sudo is disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Allow Telemetry' is set to 'Basic'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable OneSettings Auditing' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Limit Diagnostic Log Collection' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Limit Dump Collection' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Remote Procedure Call (RPC) Locator (RpcLocator)' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'SSDP Discovery (SSDPSRV)' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'UPnP Device Host (upnphost)' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Windows Media Player Network Sharing Service (WMPNetworkSvc)' is set to 'Disabled' or 'Not Installed'
(L1) Ensure 'Windows Mobile Hotspot Service (icssvc)' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Xbox Accessory Management Service (XboxGipSvc)' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Xbox Live Auth Manager (XblAuthManager)' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Xbox Live Game Save (XblGameSave)' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Xbox Live Networking Service (XboxNetApiSvc)' is set to 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Deny Access From Network' to include 'Guests, Local account'
(L1) Ensure 'Deny Remote Desktop Services Log On' to include 'Guests, Local account'
(L1) Ensure 'Hypervisor Enforced Code Integrity' is set to 'Enabled with UEFI lock'
(L1) Ensure 'Require UEFI Memory Attributes Table' is set to 'Require UEFI Memory Attributes Table'
(L1) Ensure 'Allow Auto Connect To Wi Fi Sense Hotspots' is set to 'Block'
(L1) Ensure 'Allow widgets' is set to 'Not allowed'
(L1) Ensure 'Disallow Exploit Protection Override' is set to '(Enable)'
(L1) Ensure 'Enable ESS with Supported Peripherals' is set to 'Enhanced sign-in security will be enabled…'
(L1) Ensure 'Facial Features Use Enhanced Anti Spoofing' is set to 'true'
(L1) Ensure 'Minimum PIN Length' is set to '6 more character(s)'
(L1) Ensure 'Require Security Device' is set to 'true'
(L1) Ensure 'Allow Windows Ink Workspace' is set to 'Enabled: but the user can't access it above the lock screen' OR 'Disabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Allow Clipboard Redirection' is set to 'Not allowed'
(L1) Ensure 'Allow Networking' is set to 'Not allowed'
(L1) Ensure 'Allow Auto Update' is set to 'Enabled'
(L1) Ensure 'Defer Feature Updates Period in Days' is set to 'Enabled: 180 or more days'
(L1) Ensure 'Defer Quality Updates Period (Days)' is set to 'Enabled: 0 days'
(L1) Ensure 'Manage preview builds' is set to 'Disable Preview builds'
(L1) Ensure 'Scheduled Install Day' is set to 'Every day'
(L1) Ensure 'Block "Pause Updates" ability' is set to 'Block'
(L1) Ensure 'Require PIN For Pairing' is set to 'Enabled: Pairing ceremony for new devices will always require a PIN' OR 'All pairings will require PIN'
(L1) Ensure 'Backup Directory' is set to 'Backup the password to Azure AD only'
(L1) Ensure 'Password Age Days' is set to 'Configured: 30 or fewer'
(L1) Ensure 'Password Complexity' is set to 'Large letters + small letters + numbers + special characters'
(L1) Ensure 'Password Length' is set to 'Configured: 15 or more'
(L1) Ensure 'Post-authentication actions' is set to 'Reset the password and logoff the managed account' or higher
(L1) Ensure 'Post Authentication Reset Delay' is set to 'Configured: 8 or fewer hours, but not 0'
